title: Ridemakerz Marvel Universe Spiderman and Venom Xtreme Customz Swap Set
description: New from RIDEMAKERZ, it’s XTREME CUSTOMZ. Get ready to build and customize the car or "RIDE" of your dreams with snap-on parts including custom rims, engines, and sidepipes. Choose from authentic automotive RIDEZ like the Dodge Viper and Chevy Corvette to "Hero" RIDEZ like Spider-Man and Batman. With more than a dozen different styles, you’ll want to collect them all. MIX N MATCH PARTS: Each kit includes a set of Mix N Match parts – ranging from flame sidepipes to bat wings to supercharged engines. All parts are interchangeable across bodystyles so you can customize and trick ‘em out over and over again. If you can dream it, you can build it. XTREME CUSTOMZ RIDEZ even have a 4-mode adjustable chassis so you can customize the way you cruise. Choose from Race, Jacked, Lifted and Off-Road…. all with the push of a button. XTREME CUSTOMZ RIDEZ are approximately 1:48 scale or the size of a cell phone. XTREME CUSTOMZ Swap Sets are loaded with more than twice the building and customizing fun. Each set contains two RIDE bodies and two 4-mode adjustable chassis plus: Two 4-piece sets of reversible rims, Two 4-piece sets of tires, Two spoilers, Two 2-piece sets of sidepipes, Two exclusive accessories.
